name: iPhone 13
shortDescription: The iPhone 13 features a powerful A15 Bionic chip and a dual-camera system for exceptional photography.

name: MacBook Air
shortDescription: The MacBook Air is a thin and lightweight laptop with an M1 chip and a brilliant Retina display.

name: iPad Pro
shortDescription: The iPad Pro offers a stunning Liquid Retina display and powerful A14 chip for productivity and entertainment.

name: Apple Watch Series 7
shortDescription: The Apple Watch Series 7 features a larger display, health tracking, and seamless integration with your iPhone.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra
shortDescription: The Galaxy S21 Ultra is a flagship smartphone with a powerful camera system and a large AMOLED display.

name: Samsung 55-Inch QLED 4K TV
shortDescription: This QLED TV delivers stunning 4K visuals with Quantum Dot technology and smart features.

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S7
shortDescription: The Galaxy Tab S7 is a versatile tablet with a stunning AMOLED display, S Pen support, and 5G connectivity.

name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 4
shortDescription: The Galaxy Watch 4 offers fitness and health tracking features along with seamless integration with Samsung smartphones.

name: Sony PlayStation 5
shortDescription: The PlayStation 5 offers incredible gaming experiences with ultra-fast load times and exclusive titles.

name: Sony WH-1000XM4 Wireless Headphones
shortDescription: These noise-canceling headphones provide premium sound quality and comfort for an immersive audio experience.

name: Sony Bravia 65-Inch OLED 4K TV
shortDescription: This OLED TV offers stunning 4K visuals, HDR support, and smart TV capabilities.

name: Sony Alpha 7 III Mirrorless Camera
shortDescription: The Alpha 7 III is a high-quality mirrorless camera with excellent low-light performance and 4K video capabilities.

name: Google Pixel 6 Pro
shortDescription: The Pixel 6 Pro boasts an excellent camera system, stock Android experience, and 5G connectivity.

name: Google Nest Hub
shortDescription: The Nest Hub is a smart display that can control smart home devices, display information, and play music.

name: Google Pixelbook Go
shortDescription: The Pixelbook Go is a lightweight and portable Chromebook for productivity on the go.

name: Google Nest Cam Outdoor
shortDescription: The Nest Cam Outdoor provides security and surveillance with 24/7 live video and cloud storage options.

name: Intel Core i9-11900K Processor
shortDescription: The Core i9-11900K is a high-performance CPU for gaming and content creation.

name: Intel 1TB 660p NVMe SSD
shortDescription: This NVMe SSD offers fast storage for your PC with reliable performance.

name: Intel NUC Mini PC Kit
shortDescription: The Intel NUC is a compact and customizable mini PC for various computing needs.

name: Intel Dual-Band Wi-Fi 6 Adapter
shortDescription: Upgrade your PC with high-speed Wi-Fi 6 connectivity using this Intel wireless adapter.

name: Canon EOS 5D Mark IV
shortDescription: The EOS 5D Mark IV is a professional-grade DSLR camera with outstanding image quality.

name: Canon PIXMA Pro-100 Printer
shortDescription: The PIXMA Pro-100 is a high-quality photo printer for professional photographers and enthusiasts.

name: Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark III
shortDescription: The PowerShot G7 X Mark III is a compact digital camera with excellent image quality and 4K video recording.

name: Canon Vixia HF G21 Camcorder
shortDescription: The Vixia HF G21 is a high-quality camcorder for capturing videos with professional features.
